content: I have some questionnaires with several scores, so several formulas with different questions and I have to save the formula of each score with a name and a description. Is it possible to do this in the questionnaire resource?
in principle, though, see this guide: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/

For example the "NIH Chronic Prostatitis Symptom Index" results in 3 separate scores (pain, urinary symptoms, and quality of life) and I would like to store the formulas of each score (weights of specific answers) in the questionnaire resource. (reference: https://www.prostatitis.org/symptomindex.html)

in principle, though, see this guide: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/

Thanks for the link. I will take a look at it.
